Name: Love Room
About the game: 'Love Room' is a simulation game of physical contact with a cute girl. This game supports VR. You can adjust face and body as you like. Features * Realistic face and body. * Flexible VR control. * Grip move (Suitable for this game) * Adjustable face and body. (You can save and load character properties) * Adjustable lighting. Virtual Reality NON-VR support You can play this game without VR device. (However, it's not comfortable.) You choose between two modes for non-VR play. 1. First Person Mode Move like FPS game and interact with the girl using a virtual hand. 2. Viewing Mode Camera rotates around the girl. This mode is suitable for viewing. Six poses Adjustable body and face
